tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE microbiome_data (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bacteria_name VARCHAR(50),
  abundance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_date DATE,
    participant_id INT,
    location TEXT,
    sample_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    ethnicity TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE microbiome_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    bacteria_id INT,
    abundance FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES samples(sample_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (bacteria_id) REFERENCES bacteria(bacteria_id)
);

CREATE TABLE gut_microbiome_data (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  microbiome_species VARCHAR(255),
  abundance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  health_condition VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  lead_researcher VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE sample_collection (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_date DATE,
  research_study_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (research_study_id) REFERENCES research_studies(study_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_samples (
  patient_id INT,
  sample_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES sample_collection(sample_id)
)
